project-1.title: Thinking About Eating Plants
project-1.description: Thinking About Eating Plants uses a combination of user input and limited navigation to curate the user experience. The site seeks to approach misconceptions about plant based diets without judgment, and in a way that aligns with the interests and values of the user. Note: this site is a work in progress.

project-2.title: Langing Pad - React.js
project-2.description: A crowdsourced parking application built with React.js that allows users to rent parking spaces to each other. Built as a final project for a coding bootcamp. To view without creating an account use the username: 'jonathan' and the password: 'jonathan'. Best viewed on a mobile device or a desktop mobile emulator.

project-3.title: Minimalist Minimalist Baker
project-3.description: I use the same recipe site very often, it is difficult to search and and the recipes are long blog posts. I built a site to scrape the recipes and store them so that they are easy to search and use.

project-4.title: Other Projects
project-4.description: Feel free to check out some of the other projects I've been working on recently on GitHub. The code for this portfolio site, a Python CLI game, some simple React.js apps, and more.
